channel.title: Fake Packets
channel.description:
[b]Hello Mopparscape[/b]
I have a question, Yesterday i downloaded cheat client " Emerald Dream " ( http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,633793.0.html ) And now i want to add commands into it, I know it's in client.java, But want to add new commands, Where can i find them, or how can i make them ? Thank you for the time.
Skaffa

item.title: Fake Packets
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“Skaffa, post:10, topic:519397”]" Where can i find them, or how can i make them "[/quote]you find the packet structure in the server or on rswiki. mimic it in your command with spoofed data

[quote=“Skaffa, post:10, topic:519397”]" link someone shares he’s commands, or a tut "[/quote]i gave you a command above. modify it yourself

Read full topic

item.title: Fake Packets
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

A tutorial would be a person Making a command so you know how to.
Therefore a person would still be making it for you.

Read full topic

item.title: Fake Packets
item.dc:creator: @Skaffa Skaffa
item.description:
@Skaffa wrote:

I only ask for a tut, Not saying you guys need to make me commands.
" Where can i find them, or how can i make them "
" link someone shares he’s commands, or a tut "
So where you see you guys needs to make it for me ?

Read full topic

item.title: Fake Packets

i didnt tell you to add it. i gave you an example.
[/quote]

I already have command in client.java, So there are example’s.[/quote]
If there are examples. Then get to work. Don’t have others do work for you.

Read full topic

item.title: Fake Packets
item.dc:creator: @Skaffa Skaffa
item.description:
@Skaffa wrote:

I got error’s when i add that,

client.java:7069: error: cannot find symbol m = Integer.parseInt(JOpt ionPane.showInputDialog(this, ^ symbol: variable m location: class client client.java:7072: error: cannot find symbol if (m <= -1) { ^ symbol: variable m location: class client client.java:7075: error: cannot find symbol if (m > 0) { ^ symbol: variable m location: class client client.java:7076: error: cannot find symbol i1 = (myPlayer.x - 6 >> 7) + this .baseX; ^ symbol: variable i1 location: class client client.java:7077: error: cannot find symbol n3 = (myPlayer.y - 6 >> 7) + this .baseY; ^ symbol: variable n3 location: class client client.java:7079: error: cannot find symbol this.stream.method433(i1); ^ symbol: variable i1 location: class client client.java:7080: error: cannot find symbol this.stream.writeWord(m); ^ symbol: variable m location: class client client.java:7081: error: cannot find symbol this.stream.method432(n3); ^ symbol: variable n3 location: class client client.java:7083: error: cannot find symbol pushMessage("You used the object " + m + ".", 0, ""); 
^

symbol: variable m
location: class client

Im new with cheat clients
If anyone have a tut, or something will help me, and what a beginner understand it will be great.
Thnx

Read full topic

item.title: Fake Packets
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

this is for the object packet

[code=Java] if (this.inputString.equals("//object")) {
m = Integer.parseInt(JOptionPane.showInputDialog(this,
“Object ID”, “Object”, 3));

					if (m <= -1) {
						return;
					}
					if (m > 0) {
						i1 = (myPlayer.x - 6 >> 7) + this.baseX;
						n3 = (myPlayer.y - 6 >> 7) + this.baseY;
						this.stream.createFrame(132);
						this.stream.method433(i1);
						this.stream.writeWord(m);
						this.stream.method432(n3);
					}
					pushMessage("You used the object " + m + ".", 0, "");
				}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Fake Packets
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

they are in the client class (client.java)

to add new ones, you need to know the packet ids sent to the server and the datatypes sent as well.

Read full topic
